main event: A mysterious object was observed in the sky over the Mojave desert, changing color rapidly, moving across the sky, and then shooting straight down. The witness estimated the object to be 40-50 miles in altitude.
interesting points: The object was first observed to be the size of a star and then changed color rapidly from light yellow to light silver and then to light, silver-white, while revolving in different directions every two seconds.
The witness described the object as a silver round disc with a distinct outline, ruling out the possibility of it being landing lights on a plane.
The object appeared to have a vapor, tail, or streak behind it and did not go off straight down, disappearing after moving at a tremendous speed and changing size to that of a silver dollar.
The witness and three others observed the object, which exhibited different colors such as silver, dark purple, and light purple before disappearing.
The report was forwarded to the Commanding Officer at Stead Air Force Base for suitable action.
sighted object: mysterious object in the sky, observed changing colors and moving unpredictably before disappearing
